description: [Volt Typhoon](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1017) gained initial access through exploitation of CVE-2021-40539 in internet-facing ManageEngine ADSelfService Plus servers.(Citation: Secureworks BRONZE SILHOUETTE May 2023)

external_references.description: Counter Threat Unit Research Team. (2023, May 24). Chinese Cyberespionage Group BRONZE SILHOUETTE Targets U.S. Government and Defense Organizations. Retrieved July 27, 2023.
